color_scheme.label: Site Color scheme
color_scheme.info: Only for new users who haven't chosen a color scheme or for no-js mode.

colors_text.label: Text
colors_text.info: Used as foreground color on background colors.

colors_background_2.label: Background 2
colors_background_2.info: Used in the Image tabs, Image banner, Testimonials sections, also on the Account page for the background of address cards.

colors_background_3.label: Additional background color
colors_background_3.info: Used for active filters on the Collection page, for input number background

background_gradient.label: Background gradient
background_gradient.info: Background gradient replaces background 1 where possible.

type_header_font.label: Main heading font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_section_header_font.label: Section heading font
type_section_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_header_text_transform.label: Headings text transform
type_header_text_transform.info: The setting applies to Extra large and Large headings

type_header_font_card.label: Heading font
type_header_font_card.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_text_font_card.label: Description font
type_text_font_card.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_subtitle_font.label: Font
type_subtitle_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_button_font.label: Font
type_button_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_header_menu_font.label: Font
type_header_menu_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_footer_menu_font.label: Links font
type_footer_menu_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_popups_heading_font.label: Heading popups font
type_popups_heading_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_popups_text_font.label: Text popup font
type_popups_text_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

notification_heading_scale.label: Medium notification banner font size scale

notification_text_scale.label: Small notification banner font size scale

badge_custom_show.label: Show Custom badge
badge_custom_show.info: Need to add a metafield "custom.badges" with type "Single line text" in Shopify admin. [About metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields)

show_color_swatch_title.label: Enable color swatch title on hover

trigger_swatch_other.label: Swatch trigger for other languages
trigger_swatch_other.info: If you use multiple languages ​​for your store, you will need to add names for the Swatch trigger for all languages ​​except the default language. Each swatch trigger must be in its own line.

custom_colors.label: Custom colors
custom_colors.info: Like "Red: #ff0000". Each color must be in its own line.

new_tab.label: Open links in a new tab

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

show_on_mobile.label: Enable Quick View / Quick Buy Button on mobile devices

predictive_search_enabled.label: Enable predictive search
predictive_search_enabled.info: The settings below relate to predictive search.

pagination_type.label: Pagination type
pagination_type.info: Pagination type for pages of collections and blogs.

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

cart_drawer_subtitle.label: Drawer subtitle
cart_drawer_subtitle.info: Displayed when the cart is not empty

enable_reviews_styles.label: Enable theme style for Judge.me Reviews App

enable_aside_menu.label: Enable aside menu
enable_aside_menu.info: The option applies on the desktop

content_position.label: Content position
content_position.info: The option applies on the desktop

effects.label: Sliding effects
effects.info: The option applies to the entire section with the layout "Overlay" and to the image part of the section with the layout "Standard"

effects_text.label: Sliding effects for text part
effects_text.info: The option applies only to the section with the layout "Standard" to the text part

header_overlay.label: Header overlay
header_overlay.info: Only for the first section on the page when Layout Overlay and Size Full Screen settings are enabled. Each block will be set to Color scheme 3

button_label.label: Label
button_label.info: When the button label is empty, the button will not be displayed.

image_height.label: Image height
image_height.info: The option applies only to cart drawer

overlay_opacity.label: Opacity
overlay_opacity.info: Applies only to section type overlay

overlay_enable.label: Enable
overlay_enable.info: The option applies when an image is selected

overlay_link.label: Overlay link
overlay_link.info: The link will be applied from the button link.
overlay_link.info_secondary: The link will be applied from the primary button link.

color_scheme.label: Color scheme
color_scheme.info: Applies only to section type overlay

image.label: Image
image.info: The options apply to all blocks where None is selected in the Icon option and an image is selected.

fit.label: Fit
fit.info: The option applies on the desktop

aspect_ratio.label: Aspect ratio
aspect_ratio.info: When "adapt" option is selected, the aspect ratio applies to the highest image in the blocks

text.default: This section allows you to showcase slides featuring different promotions, collections, or brand messages

product_object_fit.label: Product card fit
product_object_fit.info: The option is applied when a product is selected in the block

heading.default: Add a Slide Title That Highlights the Focus of This Slide

text.label: Text
text.default: For example, a test of the announcement of some news

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

collections_to_show.label: Columns in row
collections_to_show.info: Applicable only for the Columns Layout type.

image.label: Overcover image
image.info: The selected image overcovers the default collection image.

question.default: Here can be a commonly asked question about your product or service.

answer.default: Here can be a brief but clear response to the question, giving customers a quick answer without unnecessary details.

subheading.default: Here can be a short introduction to the image content

text.default: Here can be a description explaining the purpose of the image, whether it’s showcasing a product, telling a brand story, or highlighting a campaign.

layout.label: Desktop layout
layout.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.

subheading.default: Short introduction to the image tabs section

text.default: Here can be a short description explaining what this tab is about and what users can explore.

layout.label: Desktop layout
layout.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.

heading.default: Here Can Be an Overview of the Number of Satisfied Customers

text.default: Show how many trust your brand and love products
A satisfied customer’s words will be displayed here, sharing their thoughts on the product.

additional_text.label: Additional text
additional_text.default: Send us your request using the form below.

text.default: Use the form below to send us a message and our team will respond as quickly as possible.
Our support team is here to assist you with orders, returns, or any product inquiries.

show_count_comments.label: Show count comments
show_count_comments.info: Comments must be allowed in the blog. [Learn more about managing comments on blog posts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/blogs/managing-comments)

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: A heading is required to display the menu.

default_open.label: Mobile menu is open by default

description.default: Here can be a concise overview of your brand’s mission and what makes it unique, helping visitors understand your core values and offerings.

address.label: Address
address.default: Enter your address, including street, city, and ZIP code

working_hours.label: Working Hours
working_hours.default: Provide working hours for your business.

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

header__9.info: To add store policies, go to your [policy settings](/admin/settings/legal).

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

subscribe_paragraph.content: When customers subscribe to emails, customer accounts are created. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers)

menu.label: Menu
menu.info: Menu is displayed in the header on desktop devices and in the hamburger menu on mobile devices.

enable_search.label: Enable search
enable_search.info: To enable the promo block, you need to add the "Search promo" block.

enable_social.label: Enable social media links in mobile menu

enable_search_promo.label: Enable search promo
enable_search_promo.info: The settings below will apply if the "Enable search" option is enabled in the section's settings.

show_collection_card.label: Show collections
show_collection_card.info: If this option is disabled, settings below will not work.

show_items.label: Show popular items
show_items.info: If this option is disabled, settings below will not work.

mega_menu_trigger.label: Trigger
mega_menu_trigger.info: Write the exact name of the link from the menu.

heading_1.default: Use this for a product section

desc_1.default: Browse grouped product or content types.

heading_2.default: Here can be a main category

desc_2.default: View all available items or offerings

search_block_heading.default: Here can be a main category

trigger-open-delay.label: Time delay for a trigger open

trigger-close-delay.label: Time delay for a trigger close

manual-selector.label: CSS selector for manual trigger
manual-selector.info: If the html element has buttons or links inside, then clicking on them will not work.

overlay-close.label: Click overlay to close
overlay-close.info: Checking this will cause popup to close when user clicks on overlay

esc-close.label: Press ESC to close
esc-close.info: Checking this will cause popup to close when user presses ESC key

f4-close.label: Press F4 to close
f4-close.info: Checking this will cause popup to close when user presses F4 key

heading.label: Heading
heading.default: Here can be your popup title

description.label: Description
description.default: Here can be a short message encouraging users to take action, such as subscribing or claiming an offer.

heading.label: Heading
heading.default: Here can be a quick store update or promotion

text_declined.default: You must be at least 18 years old to access this section. Compliance with age laws is mandatory.

text_orders.default: You haven't placed any orders yet.

text_addresses.default: You haven't added any addresses yet.

text.default: You haven't added any addresses yet.

text_addresses.default: You haven't added any addresses yet.

text.default: By creating an account you agree to our terms and conditions and privacy policy.

description.label: Description
description.info: To display a different description for different blogs, you need to add a meta field with type Single line text. [About metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields)

image.label: Image
image.info: To display a different image for different blogs, you need to add a meta field with type File. [About metafields](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/custom-data/metafields)

header__1.info: Color scheme and overlay options apply to featured post when overlay layout is selected

paragraph.content: To change collection descriptions or collection images, [edit your collections.](/admin/collections)

image_products.label: Image for "Products" page
image_products.info: Image for automatically generated page with all products.

show_collection_image.label: Show collection image
show_collection_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 21:9 aspect ratio.

enable_filtering.label: Enable filtering
enable_filtering.info: Customize filters with the Search and Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters)

badges_type.label: Badges display style
badges_type.info: To display badges you need to enable them in "Settings" - "Product card" using "Show discount badge", "Show Sold out badge", "Show Custom badge" settings

show_tax_info.label: Show "Tax included".
show_tax_info.info: Configure taxes in the Shopify admin. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/taxes/us/manual-tax)

show_shipping.label: Show "Shipping calculated at checkout".
show_shipping.info: Create store policies in the Shopify admin. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/checkout-settings/refund-privacy-tos)

text.info: Leave the field blank to display the standard description

min_spend.label: Minimum spend for free shipping
min_spend.info: Use positive round number. The value will be automatically recalculated depending on the currency set in the store and the currency selected by the user.

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

characteristics.label: Assign product characteristics
characteristics.info: If this setting is selected, the title and description metafield namespace must be characteristics.name and characteristics.description, and only "Heading" setting below will be available for it

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: The option applies when page is not selected
heading.default: Here can be your popup title

text.label: Text
text.info: The option applies when page is not selected
text.default: Popular choice with 5-star reviews—see why customers love it.

page.label: Page
page.info: Create a page, the content and title of which will be displayed inside a popup. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/pages#add-new-page)

info.content: The block is displayed when the Buy buttons block is out of view.

align_content.label: Content alignment
align_content.info: The option applies on the desktop

heading.label: Heading
heading.default: This is where your subscription section goes

newsletter_text.label: Description
newsletter_text.default: Here can be a brief explanation of what subscribers will receive—whether it’s exclusive offers, product updates, or industry insights.

paragraph.content: When customers subscribe to emails, customer accounts are created. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers)

page.label: Page
page.info: Note that adding a contact page will not display the contact form. The contact form is a separate section.

product_list.label: Products
product_list.info: The product list takes priority over the collection.

text_about_products.content: If no products or collection are selected, all products in the store will be available for the section.

text_about_dynamic.content: If there are more than 50 products in the store or selected collection, products will be dynamically loaded from the collection page. The "Product card options" settings will be unavailable and will follow the settings in the "Product grid" section on the collection page. Additionally, the "Products amount" setting cannot exceed the value set in the "Product grid" section on the collection page.

button_link.info: If empty, the link will be auto-generated based on the selected sorting mode.

section_heading.default: This is where featured items go

paragraph__1.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

section_heading.default: This is where recommended items go

paragraph__1.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

section_heading.default: This is where complementary items go

subheading.default: Here can be a brief introduction

text.default: Use this space to describe a product, service, or concept in a way that is informative and engaging.

percent.label: Percent
percent.info: Recommended format "-N%", where "N" is a number from 1 to 99

promo_alignment.label: Alignment
promo_alignment.info: The option applies on the desktop

text.default: Use this space to explain the image or video—what it represents and why it matters.

icon.label: Icon
icon.info: When None is selected, the image will be displayed

text.default: This text should give a quick overview of what users will find in the columns below

video_url.label: Or embed video from URL
video_url.info: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected. Accepts YouTube or Vimeo links.

muted_video.label: Muted sound
muted_video.info: If autoplay is enabled, the sound of the video will be muted.

description_video.label: Video alt text
description_video.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

heading.default: Highlight New Collections or Seasonal Ideas

section_heading.default: Here can be your product details title

tab_text.default: Here can be a short description of this product parameter, providing clear and concise details.
